mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(video_big_img_url,'') AS videoBigImgURL, IFNULL(video_little_img_url,'') AS videoLittleImgURL, IFNULL(video_time,0) AS videoTime, IFNULL(video_author_name,'') AS videoAuthorName, IFNULL(video_author_id,'') AS videoAuthorId, IFNULL(video_id,'') AS videoId, IFNULL(video_title_master,'') AS videoTitleMaster, IFNULL(video_title_slave,'') AS videoTitleSlave, IFNULL(video_url,'') AS videoURL, IFNULL(video_resolution_width,0) AS videoResolutionWidth, IFNULL(video_resolution_height,0) AS videoResolutionHeight, IFNULL(video_loading_img_url,'') AS videoLoadingImgURL, IFNULL(video_frame_rate,25) AS videoFrameRate FROM video_video_info WHERE 1=1
